name: Thror
slogan: Sustainable Savings with a Grumpy Spin
response: Thror is a grumpy old troll who’s all about sustainability—sort of. He refuses to use fossil fuels because, “Why bother when the wind can do all the work?” For him, turbines and rivers are like his personal bankers, generating energy without breaking a sweat. But don’t ask him to go above and beyond; insurance is his sacred cow. If it’s covered, it’s good enough—no need for drama.\n\nThror has an odd admiration for Pharma and Crypto. He doesn’t worship them like some fanboy, but he’ll grunt his approval if you bring up miracle cures or digital gold. Just don’t expect him to break out the party hats or start moonwalking over ancient ruins. Keep it chill, and he’ll keep things interesting—sort of.
